Welcome to the FanGraphs-exporter documentation!¶

FanGraphs-exporter is completely open-source.

See this project’s GitHub Repository. See the latest release.

API Reference¶

class fgexporter.WebDriver
classmethod WebDriver.__init__(self)¶
options¶
Returns

The selenium.webdriver.firefox.options.Options object

The default options used:

headless: ``True``
preferences:

  • "browser.download.folderList": 2

  • "browser.download.manager.showWhenStarting": False

  • "browser.download.dir": os.getcwd()

  • "browser.helperApps.neverAsk.saveToDisk": "text/csv"

exception InvalidSettingError¶

Raised when the setting argument of FanGraphs.__init__() is not recognized

class fgexporter.FanGraphs
classmethod FanGraphs.__init__(self, *, setting)¶
Parameters

setting (str) –

The setting string which corresponds to the FanGraphs page

FanGraphs Page Title

Corresponding setting string

Major League Leaderboards

’leaders’

Projections

’projections’

:raises fgexporter.InvalidSettingError: If the setting argument is not recognized

address¶
Returns

The URL which corresponds to the initial FanGraphs page

FanGraphs Page Title

Corresponding URL

Major League Leaderboards

https://fangraphs.com/leaders.aspx

Projections

https://fangraphs.com/projections.aspx

selectors¶
Returns

A dictionary with the CSS selectors for the data configuration categories, stored by type.

Return type

Dict

webdriver¶
Returns

The WebDriver instance.

browser¶
Returns

The browser attribute of webdriver.

exception InvalidCategoryError¶

Raised when the data configuration category is invalid

exception InvalidOptionError¶

Raised when the data configuration option is invalid

classmethod get_options(self, category)¶
Parameters

category (str) – The data configuration category

Returns

List of valid options for category

Return type

List[Str]

Raises

FanGraphs.InvalidCategoryError – If category is not recognized

classmethod get_current(self, category)¶
Parameters

category (str) – The data configuration category

Returns

Current option for category

Return type

Str

Raises

FanGraphs.InvalidCategoryError – If category is not recognized

classmethod config(self, **kwargs)¶
Parameters

kwargs – Data configurations

Raises

  • FanGraphs.InvalidCategoryError – If keyword is not recognized

  • FanGraphs.InvalidOptionError – If keyword argument is not recognized

Keyword Arguments

category (str): The data configuration option which corresponds to the category. Use get_options() to get possible options.

Note that the keyword argument name is identical to the corresponding string value.

classmethod reset(self)¶

Passes address to the get method of browser

classmethod location(self)¶

Returns the address that the browser is current at.

Returns

current_url attribute of browser

Return type

Str

classmethod end_task(self)¶

Calls quit method of browser

classmethod export(self)¶

Downloads the configured data as a CSV file to the current working directory. The directory which the file is downloaded to can be altered with the "browser.download.dir" preference. The file will be named the formatted current time: datetime.datetime.now().strftime('%d.%m.%y %H.%M.%S')

Returns

Name of exported file

Return type

Str
